text: Wyrd Sisters is a fantasy book by Terry Pratchett. It was published in 1988 and it is the sixth book in the Discworld series and the first one to focus on the Witches. ==Plot== Granny Weatherwax, the witch who appeared in Equal Rites is the main character, along with the two other witches in her group. The story is a take on the Shakespeare play Macbeth.https://www.amazon.co.uk/Wyrd- Sisters-Discworld-Novel-Novels/dp/0552166642 ==TV adaptation== In 1997, the book was made into a TV mini series. == References == Category:Books by Terry Pratchett Category:1988 books
title: Wyrd Sisters
